description:
An old man loved a swallow, but when it eats his wifes glue, she cuts out its tongue.  He goes deep into the mountains to find her... A packdriver buys a good horse in town, and then some mackeral to give to the god of horses. Shinkichi works at a soy sauce shop, but since he`s so careless everyone treats him like a child.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitakiri Suzume / Umakata Yamanba / Neko no Odoriba
The Sparrow with the Severed Tongue / The Horse Mountain Woman / The Dance of the Cats
舌切り雀 / 馬方山姥 / 猫の踊り場
